synopsis: In episode #12 of PBR, hosts Devam and Ahir welcome the talented musician Valante, who shares his journey from childhood struggles to finding solace in creativity. The conversation delves into the importance of embracing life's uncertainties, the healing power of music, and the beauty of existing in the moment.
quotes: You can really change the world in small ways, I believe.
Life needs to happen for a while in order for me to have something to express.
I always felt very safe and taken care of by all older people around me.
It's a fine line between survivor's guilt and a savior complex.
The outcome of creativity is not always tangible, but itâ€™s never a waste of time.
You can lay out on your balcony and just exist.
The greatest thing ever is just doing absolutely nothing with my time.
If you want to make the world a better place, take a look at yourself and make a change.
